views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10 to 13

Spotlightless11 Disables the Down and Right Gestures for invoking the Spotlight and Gives also the Chance to Hide it Everywhere!

Configure options from Settings.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.1.3 - iOS 13 Compatibile. - Updated the Control Description File. Version 1.0.9
- Added the option to Remove the Spotlights Blur.
- Added the option to Clear the Spotlights Text Field (included ClearSpotField available on My Repo).
Version 1.0.8
- Fixed the Disable Right Gesture option Bug about Open Apps Animation on iOS 12.
- Added the Compatibility with Floating Dock Feature.


Version 1.0.7
- Compatible with iOS 12 (Thanks my Friend Olivier Crespo for pointing me the proper direction about fixing the Disable Right Gesture Bug on iOS 12).


Version 1.0.6
- Added the option to Always Show More for the Spotlight (as Requested on Twitter).


Version 1.0.5
- Added the option to Hide the Labels of the Spotlight Icons (Integration of my Tweak SpotLabeless available on my Repository).
Version 1.0.4
- Added the option to Disable the LockScreen Today View Down Gesture.
- Added Some Colors in the Preferences Panel :-)
- Fixes and options Improvements.


Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to Hide the LockScreen Today Views Access.


Version 1.0.2
- Fixed a Visual Bug afflicting the Disable Right Gesture Feature on iOS 11 (tip by sinfool).
Version 1.0.1
- Now the Disable Right Gesture Feature is no longer also hiding Everywhere the Spotlight.
- Fixed a Bug causing the Spotlight/Today View overlapping with the Disable Right Gesture Feature Switched on.
- Change in Prefs Labels.
